definitions.definition: An aromatic plant ( Tanacetum balsamita ), once used to flavour ale (prior to use of hops ); also used as a bookmark in Bibles and other holy texts to dissuade silverfish and other pests .

main_definition: An aromatic plant ( Tanacetum balsamita ), once used to flavour ale (prior to use of hops ); also used as a bookmark in Bibles and other holy texts to dissuade silverfish and other pests .
